**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3845039782-Doc3849578357
* **Title**: Standing Offer for the Supply of Raw Material for Mattress Manufacturing
* **Description**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPGS) is seeking bids for a Standing Offer (SO) for the supply of raw material (matières premières) to manufacture mattresses for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* **Industry Codes**: 53102500 (Clothing accessories), 56101508 (Mattresses or sleep sets)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada (regions de l'opportunité: Canada)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada (régions de livraison: Canada)
* **Government Buyers**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPGS)
* **Contact Information**: Mario Lafleur (mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Key Details**

* **Estimated Quantities**: 11,200 units per year
* **Contract Period**: One (1) year, with the possibility to extend for three (3) additional one-year periods
* **Delivery Address**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) - 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P0P9, Canada
* **To obtain more information and to access the full tender notice**, [visit the discovery.ariba.com website here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15276854?extsite=MTUyNzY4NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
